form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the use of Post-9/11 Educational Assistance to pursue independent study programs at certain educational institutions that are not institutions of higher learning.

section.header: Authorization for use of Post-9/11 Educational Assistance to pursue independent study programs at certain educational institutions that are not institutions of higher learning
section.text: Paragraph (4) of section 3680A(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: any independent study program except an accredited independent study program (including open circuit television) leading—

subparagraph.text: to a certificate that reflects educational attainment offered by an institution of higher learning; or
to a certificate that reflects completion of a course of study offered by—

clause.text: an area career and technical education school (as defined in section 3 of the Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Act of 2006 (20 U.S.C. 2302)) that provides education at the postsecondary level; or
a postsecondary vocational institution (as defined in section 102(c) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1002(c))) that provides education at the postsecondary level.
